message.neoskies.right_click_harvest.tip: You can harvest crops faster by right clicking!
message.neoskies.island_create.success: Your Island got successfully created, you can now visit it with the <color:#3fd9ff>/sl home <color:#98f9ff>command!
message.neoskies.island_delete.warning: Are you sure that you want to delete your Island? It can't be rolled back even with all might and determination! Type <color:#3fd9ff>/sl delete CONFIRM <color:#98f9ff>to continue.
message.neoskies.force_delete.fail: <color:#ff816a>%player% does not have an Island yet!
message.neoskies.hub_pos_change: Position of the Hub got changed to <color:#3fd9ff>%pos%
message.neoskies.invite_member.already_m: This player is already member of your Island!
message.neoskies.invite_member.already_i: You have already invited this player!
message.neoskies.invite_member.success: <color:#3fd9ff>%newcomer% <color:#98f9ff>got successfully invited! They got 5 minutes to accept your invite.
hover_event.neoskies.invite_member.accep: Click here to accept this invite or type <color:#98f9ff>/sl accept %inviter% <r>command.
message.neoskies.accept.no_island: This player does not have an Island yet.
message.neoskies.accept.fail: This player did not invite you.
message.neoskies.accept.success: You successfully accepted <color:#3fd9ff>%owner%'s <color:#98f9ff>invite! You can now visit the Island with <color:#3fd9ff>/sl home %owner% <color:#98f9ff>command.
message.neoskies.remove_member.not_membe: This player is not member of your Island.
message.neoskies.kick_visitor.member: You can't kick member of your Island.
message.neoskies.ban_player.member: You can't ban member of your Island.
message.neoskies.visit_home.not_member: You are not member of this Island.
message.neoskies.visit_home.no_island: <color:#ff816a>This player doesn't have an Island yet!
message.neoskies.home.fail: You are already on your Island!
message.neoskies.settings.lock: Your Island is now closed for visitors!
message.neoskies.settings.unlock: Your Island can now be visited!
message.neoskies.island.error.scanning: <red>There is an island scan in progress. Please wait until it's finished.
message.neoskies.island.modify.size: Successfully modified the size of <color:#3fd9ff>%player%'s <color:#98f9ff>island to <color:#3fd9ff>%size%<color:#98f9ff>

message.neoskies.help.4: - <color:#98f9ff>/%prefix% home <player> <r>→ Teleport to an Island you are member of.
message.neoskies.help.5: - <color:#98f9ff>/%prefix% members invite <player> <r>→ Invite player to your Island.
message.neoskies.help.6: - <color:#98f9ff>/%prefix% members remove <player> <r>→ Remove player from your Island.
message.neoskies.help.7: - <color:#98f9ff>/%prefix% accept <player> <r>→ Accept Island join invite request.
message.neoskies.help.8: - <color:#98f9ff>/%prefix% kick <player> <r>→ Kick player from your Island.
message.neoskies.help.9: - <color:#98f9ff>/%prefix% ban <player> <r>→ Ban player from visiting your Island.
message.neoskies.help.10: - <color:#98f9ff>/%prefix% unban <player> <r>→ Unban player to allow visiting your Island.
message.neoskies.help.12: - <color:#98f9ff>/%prefix% settings <r>→ Opens the island settings menu.
message.neoskies.help.15: - <color:#98f9ff>/%prefix% settings toggle-visits <r>→ Enables/disables ability to visit your Island.
message.neoskies.island_data:
<yellow>Island data:
<yellow>  Id: %id%
<yellow>  Owner: %owner%
<yellow>  Members: <gray>%members%
<yellow>  Radius: %radius%
<yellow>  Balance: $%balance%
<yellow>  Spawn position: %spawn_pos%
<yellow>  Visit position: %visit_pos%
<yellow>  Has Nether: %has_nether%
<yellow>  Has End: %has_end%
<yellow>  Locked: %locked%
<yellow>  Created at: %created%
neoskies.island_settings.containers.desc: <dark_gray>Allows opening, chests, dispensers, shulker boxes, etc.
neoskies.island_settings.dripleaf.descri: <dark_gray>Sets if dripleafs fall when stepped on
<dark_gray>Allows using Respawn Anchors, use with caution
neoskies.economy.name: SkyCoin

text.config.neoskies.option.safeVoidFall: Keep fall damage on safe void
